Exercise.Name: Weighted Pushup
Exercise.Description: Assume a pushup position wearing a weight vest; arms should be straight and hands slightly wider than shoulders. Bend at elbows and lower body until chest nearly touches the floor. Pause, and push body back up.

Exercise.Name: Renegade Row
Exercise.Description: Start in the high plank position and with a dumbbell in each hand. Slowly pull one dumbbell upwards towards the chest and keep the elbow close to the body. Lower it back down and switch to the opposite hand.

Exercise.Name: Chest Squeeze Pushup
Exercise.Description: Place two dumbbells next to each other so that they’re touching with the handles parallel to each other. Perform a pushup while grabbing a dumbbell handle with each hand.

Exercise.Name: Dumbbell Row
Exercise.Description: Lean one knee on bench, with dumbbell in opposite-side hand. Pull be dumbbell up and then slowly lower it down; hold dumbbell at bottom.

Exercise.Name: Single Arm Chest Press
Exercise.Description: Lying on bench, press a dumbbell up using only one arm at time.

Exercise.Name: Cross Bench Pullovers
Exercise.Description: Lie across bench the short way, reach over head, and grab dumbbell with both hands. Pull dumbbell over head to chest and back again.
